thread.title: The Cutest Red Carpet Couples At The Golden Globes
thread.title_full: The Cutest Red Carpet Couples At The Golden Globes

author: Carolyn L. Todd
title: The Cutest Red Carpet Couples At The Golden Globes
text: Carolyn L. Todd The Golden Globes are always an especially fun awards show, given the copious amounts of free-flowing champagne the ceremony known for. Seriously, the statues are only half the action. But what we're here to talk about is the first and best part of the show: the red carpet. Specifically, the adorable A-list couples that dominate it. We will never tire of seeing Hollywood's cutest pairs walk the carpet together. This year, there was a parade of gorgeous couples to "ooh" and "aw" at. The men are sporting dapper suits (along with some bad-ass ladies like Octavia Spencer and Evan Rachel Wood). And the ladies are dazzling in their gowns and diamonds, as per usual. Oh, and the look of love looks great on everyone.Without further ado, here are the cutest celebrity couples at the 2017 Golden Globes. Begin Slideshow
